mdRecord.dcterms:title: Old Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. Only authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Old tomb at Mount Vernon with two unidentified men. Label on the reverse reads: Old Tomb at Mt. Vernon, in which Washington's remains were first placed, and from which they moved in 1831 to the New Tomb, which was built according to directions.....(torn - in Wash)ington's will, and where they now lie.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Old tomb
